feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts

entry.title: The Early History of Mass Shootings

link.title: The Early History of Mass Shootings

entry.content:
Post 190503 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This isn't the first time you made multiple posts linking to a pretty obscure video channel; it's hard not to read this as less "hey I found something cool I want to share with MeFi" and more "I'm going to promote this thing". Please cut it out. Reach the moderator staff at the contact form if you have questions. -- cortex
entry.summary: Post 190503 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: This isn't the first time you made multiple posts linking to a pretty obscure video channel; it's hard not to read this as less "hey I found something cool I want to share with MeFi" and more "I'm going to promote this thing". Please cut it out. Reach the moderator staff at the contact form if you have questions. -- cortex

entry.title: Melania Trump Got an “Einstein Visa”
entry.content:
Post 190240 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This is sort of an odd post to make a year after the fact and on the other side of Trump's administration. The story an issue could be fine to post about but I think framing and sources that don't have that double-take feeling of talking about the past admin in the present tense would help there. -- cortex
entry.summary: Post 190240 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: This is sort of an odd post to make a year after the fact and on the other side of Trump's administration. The story an issue could be fine to post about but I think framing and sources that don't have that double-take feeling of talking about the past admin in the present tense would help there. -- cortex
